entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
